item.title: Got Shell!?
item.author: Author
item.description: What to do when you have a shell? Linux history whoami uname -a cat /etc/issue cat /etc/passwd sudo -l crontab -l ls -lhtrR /etc/cron* ls -lhtrR /home Windows set getuid ipconfig /all arp -a netstat -ano

item.title: Popping a Shell!
item.author: Author
